parameters.name: ArchitectureType
parameters.description:
The architecture of the instance. Valid values:

*   **cluster**: cluster architecture
*   **standard**: standard architecture
*   **rwsplit**: read/write splitting architecture

parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid**: subscription
*   **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go

parameters.name: EditionType
parameters.description:
The edition of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Community**: Community Edition
*   **Enterprise**: Enhance Edition (Tair)

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description: The database engine version of the instance. Valid values: **2.8**, **4.0**, **5.0**, and **6.0**.

parameters.name: Expired
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the instance has expired. Valid values:

*   **true**: The instance has expired.
*   **false**: The instance has not expired.

parameters.name: GlobalInstance
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the child instances of distributed instances. Valid values:

*   **true**: Only child instances are returned.
*   **false**: Child instances are not returned.

parameters.name: InstanceClass
parameters.description: The instance type of the instance. For more information, see [Instance types](~~107984~~).

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

> If you specify multiple instance IDs, separate these IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: InstanceStatus
parameters.description:
The state of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Normal**: The instance is normal.
*   **Creating**: The instance is being created.
*   **Changing**: The configurations of the instance are being changed.
*   **Inactive**: The instance is disabled.
*   **Flushing**: The instance is being released.
*   **Released**: The instance is released.
*   **Transforming**: The billing method of the instance is being changed.
*   **Unavailable**: The instance is suspended.
*   **Error**: The instance failed to be created.
*   **Migrating**: The instance is being migrated.
*   **BackupRecovering**: The instance is being restored from a backup.
*   **MinorVersionUpgrading**: The minor version of the instance is being updated.
*   **NetworkModifying**: The network type of the instance is being changed.
*   **SSLModifying**: The SSL certificate of the instance is being changed.
*   **MajorVersionUpgrading**: The major version of the instance is being upgraded. The instance remains accessible during the upgrade.

> For more information about instance states, see [Instance states and impacts](~~200740~~).

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The database engine of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Tair**
*   **Redis**
*   **Memcache**

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **CLASSIC**: classic network
*   **VPC**: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: PrivateIp
parameters.description: The private IP address of the instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the instance.

> When you call this operation and specify the **Tag** parameter, you must also specify this parameter.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs.

> You can query resource group IDs by using the ApsaraDB for Redis console or by calling the [ListResourceGroups](~~158855~~) operation. For more information, see [View basic information of a resource group](~~151181~~).

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword used for fuzzy search. The keyword can be based on an instance name or an instance ID.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the instance.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the instance.
